Posts.Content: victorious2012 wrote: I just finished my tx#4 of DD AC.  Now on to four DD of Taxotere.  I should be celebrating that I'm "half way thru chemo" but instead I am so dreading moving on to Taxotere.  My onc wants me to start 2 weeks after my last AC dose.  I've talked him into giving me an extra week.  Has anyone gotten a longer break in between the two?  Anyone aware of the rationale for doing the two drugs back to back.  I just feel like my body has taken a beating with the first four and I dread dumping more right on top.  Plus, I just want to feel normal again. Diagnosis: 11/12/2011, IDC, 2cm, Stage II, Grade 3, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Need a break from chemo! victorious2012 victorious2012
